metadata.title: CVE-2024-46844 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:um: line: always fill *error_out in setup_one_line()The pointer isn't initialized by callers, but I haveencountered cases where it's still printed; initializeit in all possible cases in setup_one_line().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
